summary.title: Great Western Railway Company: Miscellaneous Books and Records

condition.value: No availability condition provisioned for this record

description.value:
Correspondence by members of Audit Office, Paddington while on active service to office: includes photographs of men in uniform.

Includes 50 photographs depicting: Photographs contained in Audit News of members of GWR Audit Office, Paddington, while on active service in HM Forces, (persons named), group photographs, postcards etc. Dated 1915-1917.
